price: 71. Y la mujer de Abraham, que se hallaba presente, se rio (sorprendida al saber que los invitados eran ángeles) y estos le anunciaron que Al-lah le concedería a Isaac, a quien le sucedería su hijo Jacob.
arabic: وَٱمۡرَأَتُهُۥ قَآئِمَةٞ فَضَحِكَتۡ فَبَشَّرۡنَٰهَا بِإِسۡحَٰقَ وَمِن وَرَآءِ إِسۡحَٰقَ يَعۡقُوبَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: wa-im'ra-atuhu qāimatun faḍaḥikat fabasharnāhā bi-is'ḥāqa wamin warāi is'ḥāqa yaʿqūba
translations: Then We gave her glad tidings
